nodes.text: The Rebel Leader Pack was a set of two cards for the Star Wars Customizable Card Game. A "Red Leader in Red 1" and a "Gold Leader in Gold 1" card make up the set. These two cards were available from Decipher's Rebel Leader ambassadors through their appearances at card game tournaments, sci-fi conventions, and assorted hobby shops around the world. The cards were also available through occasional special promotions as well as a mail-in offer by Decipher. They were first produced in the summer of 1996.

The basic play advantage is they give players "card economy": when properly used, Rebel Leader cards let players deploy a piloted starship immediately, enabling them to begin exercising in-game strategies much sooner in a match.
